channel.title: Dorsey Wright & Associates Technical Analysis Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Dorsey Wright & Associates Technical Analysis Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Point and Figure Charting Analysis
channel.description: Dorsey, Wright research is conducted along technical lines, adhering to the relationship between supply and demand. We believe this simple but accurate economic theory is manifested as a constant battle between these two forces for control of the equity vehicle. It is this objective, logical approach which helps reduce uncertainty in the market. We believe our Research, coupled with your own fundamental research, will greatly increase your probability of success whether your investment business is equities, fixed income, mutual funds, commodities or ETFs. (For complete podcast list please visit www.dorseywright.com)
